div.p: J. A. Panton, Esq. C.M.G., Police Magistrate, Melbourne

This Government will be much obliged if you will be present and represent the Government at the funeral of the late Baron Von Mueller. Please also obtain a suitable floral wreath as a tribute of high appreciation by the people of this Colony for his life long work in the interests of scientific research in Australia.
